# Discussion Templates

This folder contains ready-to-use templates for GitHub Discussions.

## Available Templates

### welcome-announcement.md
Welcome post for new contributors. Use in the "Announcements" category.

**How to use:**
1. Enable Discussions in your repository settings
2. Go to Discussions tab
3. Click "New discussion"
4. Select "Announcements" category
5. Copy/paste the content from this template
6. Pin the discussion after posting
